医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
基因测试可以确定三阴性早期乳腺癌患者对免疫治疗的反应研究人员开发了一种基因测试，可以确定三阴性早期乳腺癌患者对免疫治疗药物的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Genetic-test-can-identify-how-患者-with-triple-阴性-early-stage-breast-cancer-will-respond-to-immunotherapy。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Genetic-test-can-identify-how-患者-with-triple-阴性-early-stage-breast-cancer-will-respond-to-immunotherapy。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88c60607-79ed-415c-a6df-4fa49d45fbfb Wed, 20 Mar 2024 14:01:37 -0400 Genetic test can identify how patients with triple negative early-stage breast cancer will respond to immunotherapy
无论年龄或绝经状况如何，派姆单抗均可增强乳腺癌治疗KEYNOTE-756 3 期临床试验的新数据表明，在乳腺癌手术前后的化疗中添加免疫治疗药物 pembrolizumab 可以为患者带来更好的结果，无论患者年龄或绝经状况如何。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Pembrolizumab-enhances-breast-cancer-treatment-regardless-of-age-or-menopausal-status.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Pembrolizumab-enhances-breast-cancer-treatment-regardless-of-age-or-menopausal-status.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c91f9d38-c1bc-4681-8a2c-847eb8f0241c Wed, 20 Mar 2024 13:56:59 -0400 Pembrolizumab enhances breast cancer treatment regardless of age or menopausal status
产前保健中的常规基因组监测可能是检测疟疾传播变化的一种经济有效的方法巴塞罗那全球健康研究所 (ISGlobal) 领导的一项研究显示，在莫桑比克消除疟疾的目标地区，孕妇和儿童体内的疟原虫遗传多样性有所下降，该中心由“la Caixa”基金会和 Manhiça 支持。健康研究中心（CISM）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Routine-genomic-surveillance-at-antenatal-care-can-be-a-cost-efficient-approach-to-detect-changes-in-malaria-传输.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Routine-genomic-surveillance-at-antenatal-care-can-be-a-cost-efficient-approach-to-detect-changes-in-malaria- Transmission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=192709f7-775a-43a3-ab01-c777fd99c8e6 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 13:48:44 -0400 Routine genomic surveillance at antenatal care can be a cost-effective approach to detect changes in malaria transmission
独特的细菌在出生后不久就会在肠道中定植，并产生血清素来培养肠道免疫细胞最近的一项研究表明，新生儿肠道细菌会产生血清素并下调单胺氧化酶 A (MOA)，以限制血清素分解，从而促进免疫耐受。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Unique-bacteria-colonize-the-gut-shortly-after-birth-and-make-serotonin-to-educate-gut-immune-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Unique-bacteria-colonize-the-gut-shortly-after-birth-and-make-serotonin-to-educate-gut-immune-cells.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=223380ae-8c2c-4815-b1ce-47d3c0368f87 Wed, 20 Mar 2024 12:13:00 -0400 Unique bacteria colonize the gut shortly after birth and make serotonin to educate gut immune cells

研究报告称，与运动和举重相关的颅面损伤发生率不断上升《颅面外科杂志》的一项研究报告称，过去十年中，与运动和举重相关的颅面损伤数量急剧增加。该期刊由威科集团 (Wolters Kluwer) 的 Lippincott 作品集出版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Study-reports-rising-rates-of-craniofacial-injuries-lated-to-exercise-and-weightlifting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240320/Study-reports-rising-rates-of-craniofacial-injuries-lated-to-exercise-and-weightlifting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25f40a3d-10a1-425f-a469-d82dcff733df Wed, 20 Mar 2024 09:37:38 -0400 Study reports rising rates of craniofacial injuries related to exercise and weightlifting
